explanation: Yolanda claims she never left her apartment all weekend. But Clue 3 reveals her neighbor saw her leaving the apartment building with car keys at 8 AM Saturday morning -- before Martin or Dean arrived at the office. The building sign-in log in Clue 2 shows no entry for Yolanda, but the security cameras were down for maintenance, and the sign-in sheet only covers the main entrance. Yolanda used the loading dock entrance early Saturday morning to move Gerald out, which explains the soil trail from reception to the loading dock in Clue 1.
funFact: Office plants have been shown to boost productivity by 15%, which is why losing one feels like losing a coworker.
